text: First World Hotel & Plaza is a place in Malaysia with a hotel, stores, and fun things to do. It has a 3-star hotel and a plaza. The company that runs it is called First World Hotel, Resorts Sdn Bhd, and it's part of Genting Malaysia Berhad and Genting Group. Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad opened it on July 26, 2002. Category:Settlements in Malaysia
title: First World Hotel & Plaza
